From: ' (USANYS)" 
c 
To: ' (USANYS)" 
I 
Subject: RE: Epstein 
Date: Wed, 24 Jul 2019 21:48:55 +0000 
Thanks for the report. 
From: (USANYS) c 
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2019 5:25 PM 
To: Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS) 
(USANYS) 
Cc 
Subject: Epstein 
(USANYS) 
<> 
(USANYS)
The team spoke this afternoon with some of Epstein's attorneys. It sounds like one of the defense attorneys (albeit not 
one who joined this call) visited Epstein yesterday, and they were thus familiar with much of the basic information we 
learned last evening. While they were somewhat circumspect, they seemed to acknowledge that it sounded like any 
injury was self-inflicted. They did not suggest that they thought Epstein had been attacked, nor did they ask us to take any 
steps to investigate or protect him. They did ask if it was possible for us to find a way to get him out of the SHU which 
they thought would be better for his mental health, and our team told them they would look into that and also directed 
them to a contact at the MCC. 
Defense counsel also said they plan to visit Epstein next Monday (before their meeting with our team that afternoon), so 
we may learn more at that point. 
EFTA00022535
